title: Balancing the Baby
description: Although Sarah Anderson loves being a new mother, the chaotic, tiring routines of daily life have led her husband Wes to let the domestic discipline aspects of their relationship fall by the wayside. When Sarah stops taking care of herself properly and starts to grow more and more disobedient, he decides not only that it’s been far too long since he took his wife over his knee for a good, hard, bare-bottom spanking, but that he needs to take charge in the bedroom as well.Wes’s dominance quickly rekindles the passion in their relationship, but he wants to take things further. Sarah remains constantly stressed out, and as far as Wes is concerned, it is time for her to submit to him more completely. He is more than ready to care for her, guide her, and correct her like a firm but loving daddy, but is she ready to be his good little girl?Publisher’s Note: Balancing the Baby is an erotic romance novel that includes spankings, sexual scenes, age play, and more. If such material offends you, please don’t buy this book.
author: Stardawn Cabot
